body.raw:
library HelloWorld version '1'

using QUICK

parameter MeasurementPeriod default Interval[DateTime(2013, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0), DateTime(2014, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0))

context Patient

define InDemographic:
    AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) >= 2 and AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) < 18

library HelloWorld version '1'

using QUICK

valueset "Female Administrative Sex": 'http://health.email.com/valueset/female-administrative-sex'

parameter MeasurementPeriod default Interval[DateTime(2013, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0), 
											 DateTime(2014, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0))


context Patient

define InDemographic:
    	AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) >= 2 
    and AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) < 18
    and Patient.gender in "Female Administrative Sex"

item.name: Get Vitamin D Deficiency in measurement Period

body.raw:
library VitaminDDeficiency version '1'

using QUICK

valueset "Female Administrative Sex": 'http://health.email.com/valueset/female-administrative-sex'
valueset "Vitamin D Deficiency" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/vitamin-d-deficiency'

parameter MeasurementPeriod default Interval[DateTime(2008, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0), 
											 DateTime(2013, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0))

context Patient

define InDemographic:
    	AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) >= 2 
    and AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) < 80
    and Patient.gender in "Female Administrative Sex"
    
define VitaminDDeficiency:
    [Condition: "Vitamin D Deficiency"] C
    	where Interval[C.onsetDateTime, C.abatementDate] overlaps MeasurementPeriod

item.name: Has Vitamin D Deficiency in measurement Period

body.raw:
library VitaminDDeficiency version '1'

using QUICK

valueset "Female Administrative Sex": 'http://health.email.com/valueset/female-administrative-sex'
valueset "Vitamin D Deficiency" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/vitamin-d-deficiency'

parameter MeasurementPeriod default Interval[DateTime(2008, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0), 
											 DateTime(2013, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0))

context Patient

define InDemographic:
    	AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) >= 2 
    and AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) < 80
    and Patient.gender in "Female Administrative Sex"
    
define VitaminDDeficiency:
    [Condition: "Vitamin D Deficiency"] C
    	where Interval[C.onsetDateTime, C.abatementDate] overlaps MeasurementPeriod
    	
define hasVitaminDDeficiency:
	exists(VitaminDDeficiency)

item.name: Has Vitamin D Deficiency with Quantity in measurement Period

body.raw:
library VitaminDDeficiency version '1'

using QUICK

valueset "Female Administrative Sex": 'http://health.email.com/valueset/female-administrative-sex'
valueset "Vitamin D Deficiency" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/vitamin-d-deficiency'

parameter MeasurementPeriod default Interval[DateTime(2008, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0), 
											 DateTime(2013, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0))

context Patient

define InDemographic:
    	AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) >= 2 
    and AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) < 80
    and Patient.gender in "Female Administrative Sex"
    
define VitaminDDeficiency:
    [Condition: "Vitamin D Deficiency"] C
    	where Interval[C.onsetDateTime, C.abatementDate] overlaps MeasurementPeriod
    	
define hasVitaminDDeficiency:
	exists(VitaminDDeficiency) and InDemographic

item.name: Female Patients between 2 and 80 which are small and heavy

exec: pm.test("Content-Type is present, if response is present", function () {

body.raw:
library VitaminDDeficiency version '1'

using QUICK

valueset "Female Administrative Sex": 'http://health.email.com/valueset/female-administrative-sex'
valueset "Vitamin D Deficiency" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/vitamin-d-deficiency'
valueset "height" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/height'
valueset "weight" : 'http://health.email.com/valueset/weight'

parameter MeasurementPeriod default Interval[@2013-01-01,@2014-01-01 )

context Patient

define InDemographic:
    	AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) >= 2 
    and AgeInYearsAt(start of MeasurementPeriod) < 80
    and Patient.gender in "Female Administrative Sex"
    
define VitaminDDeficiency:
    [Condition: "Vitamin D Deficiency"] C
    	where Interval[C.onsetDateTime, C.abatementDate] overlaps MeasurementPeriod
    	
define isSmallAndHeavy:
		exists([Observation: "height"] H where H.valueQuantity <= 165 'cm')
	and exists([Observation: "weight"] W where  W.valueQuantity >= 80 'kg')
    	
define hasVitaminDDeficiency:
	exists(VitaminDDeficiency) and InDemographic
